data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baňař, Petr, Brailovsky, Harry, Hubáčková, Lenka, Hemala, Vladimír (2014): A new species of the genus Mygdonia (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Coreidae) from Madagascar with a key to species. Zootaxa 3893 (3): 445-450, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3893.3.9
